title: Customer Analytics Dashboard - Launch Documentation
general_instruction: Create comprehensive launch documentation for our new B2B SaaS analytics product. Focus on value propositions, implementation details, and customer benefits. Use clear, professional language suitable for both technical and business stakeholders.

resources.description: Technical specifications, features, API details, and system requirements
Competitive analysis, target customer profiles, and market opportunities
Pricing tiers, packaging, and competitive positioning

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.prompt: Create a compelling executive summary that highlights the key benefits and market opportunity, drawing from the market research and product specifications. Include our unique value proposition and why this product matters now.

sections.title: Product Overview
sections.prompt: Provide a comprehensive overview of the Customer Analytics Dashboard, detailing core features and capabilities. Explain how each feature delivers value to our target customers. Structure this for both technical and non-technical readers.

sections.title: Technical Architecture
sections.prompt: Explain the technical architecture in clear prose, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability. Translate technical specifications into benefits that matter to decision makers.

sections.title: Implementation Guide
sections.prompt: Create a step-by-step implementation guide that emphasizes our 2-week deployment advantage. Include prerequisites, phases, and what customers can expect during onboarding.

sections.title: Pricing & Packages
sections.prompt: Present our pricing strategy in a clear, compelling way. Emphasize value and ROI compared to competitors. Include migration incentives and explain how pricing scales with customer growth.

sections.title: Go-to-Market Strategy
sections.prompt: Outline our go-to-market approach based on target customer profiles and competitive positioning. Include key messages, channels, and how we'll win against established competitors.
